name: దీపావళి
description: Diwali, the festival of lights, symbolizes the victory of light over darkness. It is celebrated with lamps, fireworks, and sweets across India.

name: ఉగాది
description: Ugadi marks the Telugu New Year. People prepare 'Ugadi Pachadi', a special dish that symbolizes the different flavors of life.

name: పొంగల్
description: Pongal is a harvest festival celebrated in Tamil Nadu. It involves cooking sweet rice (Pongal) and thanking nature and cattle.

name: హోలీ
description: Holi, the festival of colors, is celebrated by throwing colored powders and water. It signifies joy, forgiveness, and the arrival of spring.

name: దసరా
description: Dussehra celebrates Lord Rama's victory over Ravana. Effigies of Ravana are burned in many parts of India.
